com.att.research.xacml.api.pip

Interface PIPFinder

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EvaluationContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConfigurableEngineFinder, EngineFinder, RequestFinder, StdEvaluationContext, WrappingFinder

    public interface PIPFinder
    PIPFinder is the interface objects implement that can query multiple sources of Attributes based on a PIPRequest.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.3 $
    Author:
    car

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PIPResponse getAttributes(PIPRequest pipRequest, PIPEngine exclude)
      Retrieves Attributes that based on the given PIPRequest.

      PIPResponse getMatchingAttributes(PIPRequest pipRequest, PIPEngine exclude)
      Retrieves Attributes that match the given PIPRequest.
      PIPResponse getMatchingAttributes(PIPRequest pipRequest, PIPEngine exclude, PIPFinder pipFinderParent)
      Retrieves Attributes that match the given PIPRequest as above.

    • Method Detail

      • getAttributes

        PIPResponse getAttributes(PIPRequest pipRequest,
                        PIPEngine exclude)
                          throws PIPException
        Retrieves Attributes that based on the given PIPRequest. The PIPResponse may contain multiple Attributes and they do not need to match the PIPRequest. In this way, a PIPFinder may compute multiple related Attributes at once.
        Parameters:
        pipRequest - the PIPRequest defining which Attributes should be retrieved
        excude - the (optional) PIPEngine to exclude from searches for the given PIPRequest
        Returns:
        a com.att.research.xacml.pip.PIPResponse with the results of the request
        Throws:
        PIPException - if there is an error retrieving the Attributes.

      • getMatchingAttributes

        PIPResponse getMatchingAttributes(PIPRequest pipRequest,
                                PIPEngine exclude)
                                  throws PIPException
        Retrieves Attributes that match the given PIPRequest. The PIPResponse should only include a single Attribute with AttributeValues whose data type matches the request.
        Parameters:
        pipRequest - the PIPRequest defining which Attributes should be retrieved
        excude - the (optional) PIPEngine to exclude from searches for the given PIPRequest
        Returns:
        a com.att.research.xacml.pip.PIPResponse with the results of the request
        Throws:
        PIPException - if there is an error retrieving the Attributes.

      • getAttributes

        PIPResponse getAttributes(PIPRequest pipRequest,
                        PIPEngine exclude,
                        PIPFinder pipFinderParent)
                          throws PIPException
        Retrieves Attributes that based on the given PIPRequest as above. If the PIPFinder invokes the getAttributes method on any child PIPEngines, it should use the supplied PIPFinder rather than itself in the call.
        Parameters:
        pipRequest -
        exclude -
        pipFinderParent -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        PIPException

      • getMatchingAttributes

        PIPResponse getMatchingAttributes(PIPRequest pipRequest,
                                PIPEngine exclude,
                                PIPFinder pipFinderParent)
                                  throws PIPException
        Retrieves Attributes that match the given PIPRequest as above. If the PIPFinder invokes the getAttributes method on any child PIPEngines, it should use the supplied PIPFinder rather than itself in the call.
        Parameters:
        pipRequest -
        exclude -
        pipFinderParent -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        PIPException
